item.title: XTerra Axle Swap Redux
item.description: In March of 2023, I had an opportunity to buy an M226 axle out of a destroyed 2011 Pro4x Xterra. My Xterra trim does not come with an electric locking differential; whereas the pro4x does. Getting a full axle assembly from a pro4x trim and swapping it in is an economical way of getting a locking rear differential on xterra models that didn’t come with it. I made a whole video about the process and posted it on Youtube:
